hi iv dowloaded the game and the fix but still cant get it to work. i try and start it and it says "the application has failed to start because d3dx9_41.dll was not found. re-installing the application may fix this problem." so treid reinstalling a few times an still cant get it working can you help please?

Hi,

@CARPO0911

Download the missing .DLL file from: www.dll-files.com or ask our Support to send the file to you: Games4theworld@hotmail.com
Then, when you have the .DLL file, copy it too: C:\Program Files\Sports Interactive\Football Manager 2010

The Game should work now.
